metadata.og:title: Jozef Geefs. Equestrian statue of Leopold I
metadata.og:description: KU Leuven. Glass slides art history. Université de Louvain, between 1839 and 1939. Photographer unknown. Added information on slide. Style: Romantic. Creation/Building: 1868. Technique/Material: Bronze. Current location: Belgium, Antwerp, Leopoldplaats. EuroPhot. Art History. 19th century. Sculpture. Statue. EuroPhot. Art history. 19th century. Sculptures. Statue.
